member.name: T:Yandex.Metrica.YandexMetrica
member.summary: Static class which exposes methods for Metrica operations.

member.name: P:Yandex.Metrica.YandexMetrica.ApiKey
member.summary: Yandex.Metrica API Key value. Must be an unsigned int.

member.name: P:Yandex.Metrica.YandexMetrica.MaxReportsCount
member.summary: As soon as this number of events is in cache data is sent.

member.name: P:Yandex.Metrica.YandexMetrica.ReportCrashesEnabled
member.summary: Indicates library should catch unhandled exceptions.

member.name: M:Yandex.Metrica.YandexMetrica.ReportError(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Report an error or a handled exception. Returns immediately.

member.name: M:Yandex.Metrica.YandexMetrica.ReportEvent(System.String,System.Collections.IDictionary)
member.param: IDictionary containing additional info for event. Keys/values should be convertible to string.

member.name: M:Yandex.Metrica.YandexMetrica.ReportEvent(System.String,System.String)
member.param: JSON string containing additional info for event.

member.name: M:Yandex.Metrica.YandexMetrica.ReportExit
member.summary: Call this method when application is about to exit. This allows metrica to save its state and cached events.

member.name: P:Yandex.Metrica.YandexMetrica.ReportsEnabled
member.summary: Indicates library should allow user events reporting.

member.name: M:Yandex.Metrica.YandexMetrica.ReportUnhandledException(System.Exception)
member.summary: Report unhandled exception. Does not return immediately.

member.name: M:Yandex.Metrica.YandexMetrica.SendEventsBuffer
member.exception: If ApiKey was not specified before this call. Specify ApiKey using method.

member.name: P:Yandex.Metrica.YandexMetrica.ServerInteractionEnabled
member.summary: Indicates library is allowed to connect to server.

member.name: M:Yandex.Metrica.YandexMetrica.Start(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Start counter service with specified options.

member.name: P:Yandex.Metrica.YandexMetrica.TrackLocationEnabled
member.summary: Indicates library can use location services.
